mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVENT_START_DAY, TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVENT_END_DAY, EVENT_LIMIT, EVENT_MEM_COUNT FROM GROUP_EVENT WHERE GROUP_NO = #{gno} AND (TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date} OR TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date})
SELECT MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PRO_PATH FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_EVENT USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eno}

SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVENT_START_DAY, TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVENT_END_DAY, GROUP_NO FROM MEMBER_EVENT JOIN GROUP_EVENT USING(EVENT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ( TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date} OR TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER_EVENT WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eno} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
